    LaTeX Details

    Modifying and compiling handouts and worksheets

    If you don’t already know how to use LaTeX and/or don’t have it installed, there are countless online resources for learning about it. We recommend checking out Learn LaTeX for a detailed tutorial on composing documents using the LaTeX markup language. To compile LaTeX sourcefiles we recommend using the TeX Live distribution that is available for all major operating systems.
